author: dlr
msg: o Moved check of the maven.jar.override property outside of the loop.
o Refactored two lines appending a path to classpath in an "if" tree
into one by moving the append() call outside of the tree.

author: dlr
msg: Corrected handling of the maven.jar.override property in the execute()
method.  MavenJellyContext.getVariable(String) can returns a Boolean
object when a variable's value is convertable into such --
maven.jar.override is this type of variable.

author: dlr
